DataElement.preferredName: International Classification of Disease, Tenth Revision Diagnosis Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The  code that represents diagnosis using the International Classification of Disease, Tenth Revision.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor Identifier Domain International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain that represents the data that uniquely identifies tumors._The tenth version of the International Classification of Diseases (ICD), published by the World Health Organization in 1992._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.longName: International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision
Concepts.definition: The tenth version of the International Classification of Diseases (ICD), published by the World Health Organization in 1992.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 3226287 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
